comments:
in a jsp file, include the following:
<% String local = "im loco";
out.println(local);
%>

now click on local and try Refactor->Move
Textual Move dialog pops up allowing you to move the local variable
but then when you select a Java file and hit OK, you get
"Unexpected exception while performing the refactoring.  See log for a 
detailed error description.

assertion failed;"

You get the following in the log:

I also noticed that when you try Refactor->Rename on a local variable in a 
JSP, nothing happens.  It'd be nice to get an error message in the status bar 
telling you the selected element could not be refactored.
